EffectSpikeCleaner Class Reference

#include <SpikeCleaner.h>

Inheritance diagram for EffectSpikeCleaner:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

An EffectSimpleMono for removing spikes.

This is a simple version, Audacity could do with a more sophisticated approach to this.
